text: Judas Christ is the seventh album from gothic band Tiamat. Despite keeping the gothic-metal based sound of Skeleton Skeletron, it takes more influences from gothic rock but fewer elements of heavy metal. ==Track listing== All songs by Johan Edlund except where noted. # "The Return of the Son of Nothing" – 4:59 # "So Much for Suicide" – 4:23 # "Vote for Love" – 4:49 # "The Truth's for Sale" – 4:40 # "Fireflower" – 3:47 (Edlund, Sköld) # "Sumer by Night" – 2:37 (Edlund, Iwers, Petersson, Sköld) # "Love is as Good as Soma" – 6:42 # "Angel Holograms" – 3:38 # "Spine" – 4:05 (Edlund, Iwers, Nissen) # "I Am in Love with Myself" – 4:22 # "Heaven of High" – 3:52 # "Too Far Gone" – 4:49 (Edlund, Iwers) # "Sixshooter" (limited edition bonus track) – 4:10 # "However You Look at it You Lose" (limited edition bonus track) – 4:08 Tracks are divided into 4 parts: Spinae (1-4), Tropic of Venus (5-7), Tropic of Capricorn (8-10), Casadores (11-12). Bonus tracks (13,14) are called "The Hamburg Tapes". ==Personnel== * Johan Edlund - guitars & vocals * Thomas Petersson - guitars * Anders Iwers - bass * Lars Sköld - drums & percussion Additional personnel: * Out of Phase - keys, programming & dijeridoo * Maska - violin, sitar & oud Backing vocals by Trille Palsgaard, Johan Edlund, Anders Iwers, Lars Nissen & Lars Sköld. Additional guitars by Anders Iwers.
